00046 PRIVATE REAL INLINE dB2lin( REAL dB )
00047 {
00048     return pow( 10.0, dB / 20.0 );
00049 }
00050 
00051 PRIVATE int setRXFilter( int n, char **p )
00052 {
00053     REAL low_frequency = atof( p[0] ),
00054         high_frequency = atof( p[1] );
00055     int i,
00056         ncoef = uni->buflen + 1,
00057         fftlen = 2 * uni->buflen;
00058     fftwf_plan ptmp;
00059     COMPLEX *zcvec;
00060 
00061     if ( fabs( low_frequency ) >= 0.5 * uni->samplerate )
00062         return -1;
00063     if ( fabs( high_frequency ) >= 0.5 * uni->samplerate )
00064         return -2;
00065     if ( ( low_frequency + 10 ) >= high_frequency )
00066         return -3;
00067     delFIR_COMPLEX( rx[RL]->filt.coef );
00068 
00069     rx[RL]->filt.coef =
00070         newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( low_frequency, high_frequency,
00071                                  uni->samplerate, ncoef );
00072 
00073     zcvec = newvec_COMPLEX( fftlen, "filter z vec in setFilter" );
00074     ptmp =
00075         fftwf_plan_dft_1d( fftlen, ( fftwf_complex * ) zcvec,
00076                            ( fftwf_complex * ) rx[RL]->filt.ovsv->zfvec,
00077                            FFTW_FORWARD, uni->wisdom.bits );
00078 #ifdef LHS
00079     for ( i = 0; i < ncoef; i++ )
00080         zcvec[i] = rx[RL]->filt.coef->coef[i];
00081 #else
00082     for ( i = 0; i < ncoef; i++ )
00083         zcvec[fftlen - ncoef + i] = rx[RL]->filt.coef->coef[i];
00084 #endif /*  */
00085     fftwf_execute( ptmp );
00086     fftwf_destroy_plan( ptmp );
00087     delvec_COMPLEX( zcvec );
00088     normalize_vec_COMPLEX( rx[RL]->filt.ovsv->zfvec,
00089                            rx[RL]->filt.ovsv->fftlen );
00090     memcpy( ( char * ) rx[RL]->filt.save, ( char * ) rx[RL]->filt.ovsv->zfvec,
00091             rx[RL]->filt.ovsv->fftlen * sizeof( COMPLEX ) );
00092 
00093     return 0;
00094 }

00096 PRIVATE int setTXFilter( int n, char **p )
00097 {
00098     REAL low_frequency = atof( p[0] ),
00099         high_frequency = atof( p[1] );
00100     int i,
00101         ncoef = uni->buflen + 1,
00102         fftlen = 2 * uni->buflen;
00103     fftwf_plan ptmp;
00104     COMPLEX *zcvec;
00105 
00106     if ( fabs( low_frequency ) >= 0.5 * uni->samplerate )
00107         return -1;
00108     if ( fabs( high_frequency ) >= 0.5 * uni->samplerate )
00109         return -2;
00110     if ( ( low_frequency + 10 ) >= high_frequency )
00111         return -3;
00112     delFIR_COMPLEX( tx->filt.coef );
00113     tx->filt.coef =
00114         newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( low_frequency, high_frequency,
00115                                  uni->samplerate, ncoef );
00116 
00117     zcvec = newvec_COMPLEX( fftlen, "filter z vec in setFilter" );
00118     ptmp =
00119         fftwf_plan_dft_1d( fftlen, ( fftwf_complex * ) zcvec,
00120                            ( fftwf_complex * ) tx->filt.ovsv->zfvec,
00121                            FFTW_FORWARD, uni->wisdom.bits );
00122 
00123 #ifdef LHS
00124     for ( i = 0; i < ncoef; i++ )
00125         zcvec[i] = tx->filt.coef->coef[i];
00126 #else
00127     for ( i = 0; i < ncoef; i++ )
00128         zcvec[fftlen - ncoef + i] = tx->filt.coef->coef[i];
00129 #endif /*  */
00130     fftwf_execute( ptmp );
00131     fftwf_destroy_plan( ptmp );
00132     delvec_COMPLEX( zcvec );
00133     normalize_vec_COMPLEX( tx->filt.ovsv->zfvec, tx->filt.ovsv->fftlen );
00134     memcpy( ( char * ) tx->filt.save, ( char * ) tx->filt.ovsv->zfvec,
00135             tx->filt.ovsv->fftlen * sizeof( COMPLEX ) );
00136 
00137     return 0;
00138 }

00140 PRIVATE int setFilter( int n, char **p )
00141 {
00142     if ( n == 2 )
00143         return setRXFilter( n, p );
00144     else
00145     {
00146         int trx = atoi( p[2] );
00147 
00148         if ( trx == RX )
00149             return setRXFilter( n, p );
00150         else if ( trx == TX )
00151             return setTXFilter( n, p );
00152         else
00153             return -1;
00154     }
00155 }

00157 // setMode <mode> [TRX]
00158 PRIVATE int setMode( int n, char **p )
00159 {
00160     int mode = atoi( p[0] );
00161 
00162     if ( n > 1 )
00163     {
00164         int trx = atoi( p[1] );
00165 
00166         switch ( trx )
00167         {
00168         case TX:
00169             tx->mode = mode;
00170             break;
00171         case RX:
00172         default:
00173             rx[RL]->mode = mode;
00174             break;
00175         }
00176     }
00177     else
00178         tx->mode = rx[RL]->mode = uni->mode.sdr = mode;
00179     if ( rx[RL]->mode == AM )
00180         rx[RL]->am.gen->mode = AMdet;
00181     if ( rx[RL]->mode == SAM )
00182         rx[RL]->am.gen->mode = SAMdet;
00183     return 0;
00184 }

00186 PRIVATE int setOsc( int n, char **p )
00187 {
00188     double newfreq = atof( p[0] );
00189 
00190     if ( fabs( newfreq ) >= 0.5 * uni->samplerate )
00191         return -1;
00192     newfreq *= 2.0 * M_PI / uni->samplerate;
00193     if ( n > 1 )
00194     {
00195         int trx = atoi( p[1] );
00196 
00197         switch ( trx )
00198         {
00199         case TX:
00200             tx->osc.gen->Frequency = newfreq;
00201             break;
00202         case RX:
00203         default:
00204             rx[RL]->osc.gen->Frequency = newfreq;
00205             break;
00206         }
00207     }
00208     else
00209         tx->osc.gen->Frequency = rx[RL]->osc.gen->Frequency = newfreq;
00210     return 0;
00211 }

00213 PRIVATE void replay_updates( void )
00214 {
00215     char _str[4096],
00216         *str = _str;
00217     splitfld _splt,
00218             *splt = &_splt;
00219     BOOLEAN quiet = FALSE;
00220     extern CTE update_cmds[];
00221     FILE *log;
00222 
00223     log = top->verbose ? stderr : 0;
00224 
00225     // left back at end after rewind
00226     // and subsequent reads
00227     rewind( uni->update.fp );
00228 
00229     while ( fgets( str, 4096, uni->update.fp ) )
00230     {
00231 
00232         // echo to logging output?
00233         if ( *str == '-' )
00234         {
00235             quiet = TRUE;
00236             str++;
00237         }
00238         else
00239             quiet = FALSE;
00240 
00241         split( splt, str );
00242         if ( NF( splt ) < 1 )
00243             continue;
00244 
00245         else
00246         {
00247             Thunk thk = Thunk_lookup( update_cmds, F( splt, 0 ) );
00248 
00249             if ( !thk )
00250                 continue;
00251 
00252             else
00253             {
00254                 int val = ( *thk ) ( NF( splt ) - 1, Fptr( splt, 1 ) );
00255 
00256                 if ( log && !quiet )
00257                 {
00258                     int i;
00259                     char *s = since( &top->start_tv );
00260 
00261                     fprintf( log, "replay[%s]: returned %d from", s, val );
00262                     for ( i = 0; i < NF( splt ); i++ )
00263                         fprintf( log, " %s", F( splt, i ) );
00264                     putc( '\n', log );
00265                     fflush( log );
00266                 }
00267                 // discard val
00268             }
00269         }
00270     }
00271 }

00366 PRIVATE int setTXALCAttack( int n, char **p )
00367 {
00368     REAL tmp = atof( p[0] );
00369 
00370     tx->alc.gen->attack = 1.0 - exp( -1000.0 / ( tmp * uni->samplerate ) );
00371     tx->alc.gen->one_m_attack = exp( -1000.0 / ( tmp * uni->samplerate ) );
00372     tx->alc.gen->sndx =
00373         ( tx->alc.gen->indx +
00374           ( int ) ( 0.003 * uni->samplerate * tmp ) ) & tx->alc.gen->mask;
00375     tx->alc.gen->fastindx =
00376         ( tx->alc.gen->sndx +
00377           FASTLEAD * tx->alc.gen->mask ) & tx->alc.gen->mask;
00378     tx->alc.gen->fasthangtime = 0.1;
00379     return 0;
00380 }

00458 PRIVATE int setRXAGC( int n, char **p )
00459 {
00460     int setit = atoi( p[0] );
00461 
00462     rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->mode = 1;
00463     rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->attack =
00464         1.0 - exp( -1000 / ( 2.0 * uni->samplerate ) );
00465     rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->one_m_attack = 1.0 - rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->attack;
00466     rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->hangindex = rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->indx = 0;
00467     rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->sndx = ( int ) ( uni->samplerate * 0.006f );
00468     rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->fastindx = FASTLEAD;
00469     switch ( setit )
00470     {
00471     case agcOFF:
00472         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->mode = agcOFF;
00473         rx[RL]->dttspagc.flag = TRUE;
00474         break;
00475     case agcSLOW:
00476         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->mode = agcSLOW;
00477         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->hangtime = 0.5;
00478         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->fasthangtime = 0.1;
00479         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->decay =
00480             1.0 - exp( -1000 / ( 500.0 * uni->samplerate ) );
00481         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->one_m_decay = 1.0 - rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->decay;
00482         rx[RL]->dttspagc.flag = TRUE;
00483         break;
00484     case agcMED:
00485         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->mode = agcMED;
00486         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->hangtime = 0.25;
00487         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->fasthangtime = 0.1;
00488         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->decay =
00489             1.0 - exp( -1000 / ( 250.0 * uni->samplerate ) );
00490         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->one_m_decay = 1.0 - rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->decay;
00491         rx[RL]->dttspagc.flag = TRUE;
00492         break;
00493     case agcFAST:
00494         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->mode = agcFAST;
00495         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->hangtime = 0.1;
00496         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->fasthangtime = 0.1;
00497         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->hangtime = 0.1;
00498         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->decay =
00499             1.0 - exp( -1000 / ( 100.0 * uni->samplerate ) );
00500         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->one_m_decay = 1.0 - rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->decay;
00501         rx[RL]->dttspagc.flag = TRUE;
00502         break;
00503     case agcLONG:
00504         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->mode = agcLONG;
00505         rx[RL]->dttspagc.flag = TRUE;
00506         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->hangtime = 0.75;
00507         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->fasthangtime = 0.1;
00508         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->decay = 1.0 - exp( -0.5 / uni->samplerate );
00509         rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->one_m_decay = 1.0 - rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->decay;
00510         break;
00511     }
00512     return 0;
00513 }

00515 PRIVATE int setRXAGCAttack( int n, char **p )
00516 {
00517     REAL tmp = atof( p[0] );
00518 
00519     rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->mode = 1;
00520     rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->hangindex = rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->indx = 0;
00521     rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->sndx = ( int ) ( uni->samplerate * 0.006 );
00522     rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->fasthangtime = 0.1;
00523     rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->fastindx = FASTLEAD;
00524     rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->attack =
00525         1.0 - exp( -1000.0 / ( tmp * uni->samplerate ) );
00526     rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->one_m_attack =
00527         exp( -1000.0 / ( tmp * uni->samplerate ) );
00528     rx[RL]->dttspagc.gen->sndx = ( int ) ( uni->samplerate * tmp * 0.003 );
00529     return 0;
00530 }

00635 PRIVATE REAL gmean( REAL x, REAL y )
00636 {
00637     return sqrt( x * y );

00640 PRIVATE int setGrphRXEQ3( int n, char **p )
00641 {
00642     if ( n < 4 )
00643         return -1;
00644     else
00645     {
00646         int i;
00647         fftwf_plan ptmp;
00648         ComplexFIR tmpfilt;
00649         COMPLEX *filtcoef = newvec_COMPLEX( 512, "filter for EQ" ),
00650             *tmpcoef = newvec_COMPLEX( 257, "tmp filter for EQ" );
00651         REAL gain[3],
00652              preamp = dB2lin( atof( p[0] ) ) * 0.5;
00653 
00654         tmpfilt = newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( -400, 400, uni->samplerate, 257 );
00655         for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00656             tmpcoef[i] = Cscl( tmpfilt->coef[i], gain[0] );
00657         delFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( tmpfilt );
00658 
00659         tmpfilt = newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( 400, 1500, uni->samplerate, 257 );
00660         for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00661             tmpcoef[i] =
00662                 Cadd( tmpcoef[i], Cscl( tmpfilt->coef[i], gain[1] ) );
00663         delFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( tmpfilt );
00664 
00665         tmpfilt =
00666             newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( -1500, -400, uni->samplerate, 257 );
00667         for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00668             tmpcoef[i] =
00669                 Cadd( tmpcoef[i], Cscl( tmpfilt->coef[i], gain[1] ) );
00670         delFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( tmpfilt );
00671 
00672         tmpfilt = newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( 1500, 6000, uni->samplerate, 257 );
00673         for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00674             tmpcoef[i] =
00675                 Cadd( tmpcoef[i], Cscl( tmpfilt->coef[i], gain[2] ) );
00676         delFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( tmpfilt );
00677 
00678         tmpfilt =
00679             newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( -6000, -1500, uni->samplerate, 257 );
00680         for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00681             tmpcoef[i] =
00682                 Cadd( tmpcoef[i], Cscl( tmpfilt->coef[i], gain[2] ) );
00683         delFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( tmpfilt );
00684 
00685         for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00686             filtcoef[254 + i] = tmpcoef[i];
00687 
00688         ptmp =
00689             fftwf_plan_dft_1d( 512, ( fftwf_complex * ) filtcoef,
00690                                ( fftwf_complex * ) rx[RL]->grapheq.gen->p->
00691                                zfvec, FFTW_FORWARD, uni->wisdom.bits );
00692 
00693         fftwf_execute( ptmp );
00694         fftwf_destroy_plan( ptmp );
00695         delvec_COMPLEX( filtcoef );
00696         delvec_COMPLEX( tmpcoef );
00697     }
00698 
00699     return 0;
00700 }
00701 
00702 PRIVATE int setGrphRXEQ10( int n, char **p )
00703 {
00704     if ( n < 11 )
00705         return -1;
00706     else
00707     {
00708         int band,
00709             i,
00710             j;
00711         fftwf_plan ptmp;
00712         ComplexFIR tmpfilt;
00713         COMPLEX *filtcoef = newvec_COMPLEX( 512, "filter for EQ" ),
00714             *tmpcoef = newvec_COMPLEX( 257, "tmp filter for EQ" );
00715         REAL preamp = dB2lin( atof( p[0] ) ) * 0.5;
00716 
00717         for ( j = 1, band = 15; j <= 10; j++, band += 3 )
00718         {
00719             REAL f_here = ISOband_get_nominal( band ),
00720                 f_below = gmean( f_here / 2.0, f_here ),
00721                 f_above = gmean( f_here, f_here * 2.0 ),
00722                 g_here = dB2lin( atof( p[j] ) ) * preamp;
00723 
00724             tmpfilt =
00725                 newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( -f_above, -f_below, uni->samplerate,
00726                                          257 );
00727             for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00728                 tmpcoef[i] =
00729                     Cadd( tmpcoef[i], Cscl( tmpfilt->coef[i], g_here ) );
00730             delFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( tmpfilt );
00731 
00732             tmpfilt =
00733                 newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( f_below, f_above, uni->samplerate,
00734                                          257 );
00735             for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00736                 tmpcoef[i] =
00737                     Cadd( tmpcoef[i], Cscl( tmpfilt->coef[i], g_here ) );
00738             delFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( tmpfilt );
00739         }
00740 
00741         for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00742             filtcoef[254 + i] = tmpcoef[i];
00743 
00744         ptmp =
00745             fftwf_plan_dft_1d( 512, ( fftwf_complex * ) filtcoef,
00746                                ( fftwf_complex * ) rx[RL]->grapheq.gen->p->
00747                                zfvec, FFTW_FORWARD, uni->wisdom.bits );
00748 
00749         fftwf_execute( ptmp );
00750         fftwf_destroy_plan( ptmp );
00751         delvec_COMPLEX( filtcoef );
00752         delvec_COMPLEX( tmpcoef );
00753     }
00754 
00755     return 0;
00756 }
00757 
00758 PRIVATE int setGrphTXEQ3( int n, char **p )
00759 {
00760     if ( n < 4 )
00761         return -1;
00762     else
00763     {
00764         int i;
00765         fftwf_plan ptmp;
00766         ComplexFIR tmpfilt;
00767         COMPLEX *filtcoef = newvec_COMPLEX( 512, "filter for EQ" ),
00768             *tmpcoef = newvec_COMPLEX( 257, "tmp filter for EQ" );
00769         REAL gain[3],
00770              preamp = dB2lin( atof( p[0] ) ) * 0.5;
00771 
00772         gain[0] = dB2lin( atof( p[1] ) ) * preamp;
00773         gain[1] = dB2lin( atof( p[2] ) ) * preamp;
00774         gain[2] = dB2lin( atof( p[3] ) ) * preamp;
00775 
00776         tmpfilt = newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( -400, 400, uni->samplerate, 257 );
00777         for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00778             tmpcoef[i] = Cscl( tmpfilt->coef[i], gain[0] );
00779         delFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( tmpfilt );
00780 
00781         tmpfilt = newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( 400, 1500, uni->samplerate, 257 );
00782         for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00783             tmpcoef[i] =
00784                 Cadd( tmpcoef[i], Cscl( tmpfilt->coef[i], gain[1] ) );
00785         delFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( tmpfilt );
00786 
00787         tmpfilt =
00788             newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( -1500, -400, uni->samplerate, 257 );
00789         for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00790             tmpcoef[i] =
00791                 Cadd( tmpcoef[i], Cscl( tmpfilt->coef[i], gain[1] ) );
00792         delFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( tmpfilt );
00793 
00794         tmpfilt = newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( 1500, 6000, uni->samplerate, 257 );
00795         for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00796             tmpcoef[i] =
00797                 Cadd( tmpcoef[i], Cscl( tmpfilt->coef[i], gain[2] ) );
00798         delFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( tmpfilt );
00799 
00800         tmpfilt =
00801             newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( -6000, -1500, uni->samplerate, 257 );
00802         for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00803             tmpcoef[i] =
00804                 Cadd( tmpcoef[i], Cscl( tmpfilt->coef[i], gain[2] ) );
00805         delFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( tmpfilt );
00806         for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00807             filtcoef[255 + i] = tmpcoef[i];
00808 
00809         ptmp =
00810             fftwf_plan_dft_1d( 512, ( fftwf_complex * ) filtcoef,
00811                                ( fftwf_complex * ) tx->grapheq.gen->p->zfvec,
00812                                FFTW_FORWARD, uni->wisdom.bits );
00813         fftwf_execute( ptmp );
00814 
00815         fftwf_destroy_plan( ptmp );
00816         delvec_COMPLEX( filtcoef );
00817     }
00818 
00819     return 0;
00820 }
00821 
00822 PRIVATE int setGrphTXEQ10( int n, char **p )
00823 {
00824     if ( n < 11 )
00825         return -1;
00826     else
00827     {
00828         int band,
00829             i,
00830             j;

00833         COMPLEX *filtcoef = newvec_COMPLEX( 512, "filter for EQ" ),
00834             *tmpcoef = newvec_COMPLEX( 257, "tmp filter for EQ" );
00835         REAL preamp = dB2lin( atof( p[0] ) ) * 0.5;
00836 
00837         for ( j = 1, band = 15; j <= 10; j++, band += 3 )
00838         {
00839             REAL f_here = ISOband_get_nominal( band ),
00840                 f_below = gmean( f_here / 2.0, f_here ),
00841                 f_above = gmean( f_here, f_here * 2.0 ),
00842                 g_here = dB2lin( atof( p[j] ) ) * preamp;
00843 
00844             tmpfilt =
00845                 newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( -f_above, -f_below, uni->samplerate,
00846                                          257 );
00847             for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00848                 tmpcoef[i] =
00849                     Cadd( tmpcoef[i], Cscl( tmpfilt->coef[i], g_here ) );
00850             delFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( tmpfilt );
00851 
00852             tmpfilt =
00853                 newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( f_below, f_above, uni->samplerate,
00854                                          257 );
00855             for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00856                 tmpcoef[i] =
00857                     Cadd( tmpcoef[i], Cscl( tmpfilt->coef[i], g_here ) );
00858             delFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( tmpfilt );
00859         }
00860 
00861         for ( i = 0; i < 257; i++ )
00862             filtcoef[254 + i] = tmpcoef[i];
00863 
00864         ptmp =
00865             fftwf_plan_dft_1d( 512, ( fftwf_complex * ) filtcoef,

00871         delvec_COMPLEX( filtcoef );
00872         delvec_COMPLEX( tmpcoef );
00873     }
00874 
00875     return 0;
00876 }

01050 #if 0
01051 // next-trx-mode [nbufs-to-zap]
01052 PRIVATE int setSWCH( int n, char **p )
01053 {
01054     top->swch.trx.next = atoi( p[0] );
01055     if ( n > 1 )
01056         top->swch.bfct.want = atoi( p[1] );
01057     else
01058         top->swch.bfct.want = 0;
01059     top->swch.bfct.have = 0;

01062     top->state = RUN_SWCH;

01066 
01067 // next-trx-mode fall-msec stdy-msec rise-msec
01068 PRIVATE int setSWCH( int n, char **p )
01069 {
01070     if ( n < 4 )
01071         return -1;
01072     else
01073     {
01074         int nextrx = atoi( p[0] );
01075         REAL fallms = atof( p[1] ),
01076             stdyms = atof( p[2] ),
01077             risems = atof( p[3] );
01078 
01079         top->swch.trx.next = nextrx;
01080 
01081         top->swch.env.fall.size = uni->samplerate * fallms / 1e3 + 0.5;
01082         if ( top->swch.env.fall.size > 1 )
01083             top->swch.env.fall.incr = -1.0 / ( top->swch.env.fall.size - 1 );
01084         else
01085             top->swch.env.fall.incr = -1.0;
01086 
01087         top->swch.env.stdy.size = uni->samplerate * stdyms / 1e3 + 0.5;
01088         top->swch.env.stdy.incr = 0.0;
01089 
01090         top->swch.env.rise.size = uni->samplerate * risems / 1e3 + 0.5;
01091         if ( top->swch.env.rise.size > 1 )
01092             top->swch.env.rise.incr = 1.0 / ( top->swch.env.rise.size - 1 );
01093         else
01094             top->swch.env.rise.incr = 1.0;
01095 
01096         top->swch.env.curr.type = SWCH_FALL;
01097         top->swch.env.curr.cnt = 0;
01098         top->swch.env.curr.val = 1.0;
01099 
01100         if ( top->state != RUN_SWCH )
01101             top->swch.run.last = top->state;
01102         top->state = RUN_SWCH;
01103         return 0;
01104     }
01105 }

01133 PRIVATE int setRXListen( int n, char **p )
01134 {
01135     int lis = atoi( p[0] );
01136 
01137     if ( lis < 0 || lis >= uni->multirx.nrx )
01138         return -1;
01139     else
01140     {
01141         uni->multirx.lis = lis;
01142         return 0;
01143     }
01144 }
01145 
01146 PRIVATE int setRXOn( int n, char **p )
01147 {
01148     if ( n < 1 )
01149     {
01150         if ( uni->multirx.act[RL] )
01151             return -1;
01152         else
01153         {
01154             uni->multirx.act[RL] = TRUE;
01155             uni->multirx.nac++;
01156             rx[RL]->tick = 0;
01157             return 0;
01158         }
01159     }
01160     else
01161     {
01162         int k = atoi( p[0] );
01163 
01164         if ( k < 0 || k >= uni->multirx.nrx )
01165             return -1;
01166         else
01167         {
01168             if ( uni->multirx.act[k] )
01169                 return -1;
01170             else
01171             {
01172                 uni->multirx.act[k] = TRUE;
01173                 uni->multirx.nac++;
01174                 rx[k]->tick = 0;
01175                 return 0;
01176             }
01177         }
01178     }
01179 }
01180 
01181 PRIVATE int setRXOff( int n, char **p )
01182 {
01183     if ( n < 1 )
01184     {
01185         if ( !uni->multirx.act[RL] )
01186             return -1;
01187         else
01188         {
01189             uni->multirx.act[RL] = FALSE;
01190             --uni->multirx.nac;
01191             return 0;
01192         }
01193     }
01194     else
01195     {
01196         int k = atoi( p[0] );
01197 
01198         if ( k < 0 || k >= uni->multirx.nrx )
01199             return -1;
01200         else
01201         {
01202             if ( !uni->multirx.act[k] )
01203                 return -1;
01204             else
01205             {
01206                 uni->multirx.act[k] = FALSE;
01207                 --uni->multirx.nac;
01208                 return 0;
01209             }
01210         }
01211     }
01212 }
01213 
01214 // [pos]  0.0 <= pos <= 1.0
01215 
01216 PRIVATE int setRXPan( int n, char **p )
01217 {
01218     REAL pos,
01219          theta;
01220 
01221     if ( n < 1 )
01222     {
01223         pos = 0.5;
01224         theta = ( 1.0 - pos ) * M_PI / 2.0;
01225         rx[RL]->azim = Cmplx( cos( theta ), sin( theta ) );
01226         return 0;
01227     }
01228     else
01229     {
01230         if ( ( pos = atof( p[0] ) ) < 0.0 || pos > 1.0 )
01231             return -1;
01232         theta = ( 1.0 - pos ) * M_PI / 2.0;
01233         rx[RL]->azim = Cmplx( cos( theta ), sin( theta ) );
01234         return 0;
01235     }
01236 }
01237 
01238 // [gain] gain in dB
01239 
01240 PRIVATE int setRXGain( int n, char **p )
01241 {
01242     if ( n < 1 )
01243     {
01244         rx[RL]->gain = 1.0;
01245         return 0;
01246     }
01247     else
01248     {
01249         rx[RL]->gain = dB2lin( atof( p[0] ) );
01250         return 0;
01251     }
01252 }
01253 
01254 PRIVATE int setCompandSt( int n, char **p )
01255 {
01256     if ( n < 1 )
01257     {
01258         tx->cpd.flag = FALSE;
01259         return 0;
01260     }
01261     else
01262     {
01263         BOOLEAN flag = atoi( p[0] );
01264 
01265         if ( n > 1 )
01266         {
01267             switch ( atoi( p[1] ) )
01268             {
01269             case RX:
01270                 rx[RL]->cpd.flag = flag;
01271                 break;
01272             case TX:
01273             default:
01274                 tx->cpd.flag = flag;
01275                 break;
01276             }
01277         }
01278         else
01279             tx->cpd.flag = flag;
01280         return 0;
01281     }
01282 }
01283 
01284 PRIVATE int setCompand( int n, char **p )
01285 {
01286     if ( n < 1 )
01287         return -1;
01288     else
01289     {
01290         REAL fac = atof( p[0] );
01291 
01292         if ( n > 1 )
01293         {
01294             switch ( atoi( p[1] ) )
01295             {
01296             case RX:
01297                 WSCReset( rx[RL]->cpd.gen, fac );
01298                 break;
01299             case TX:
01300             default:
01301                 WSCReset( tx->cpd.gen, fac );
01302                 break;
01303             }
01304         }
01305         else
01306             WSCReset( tx->cpd.gen, fac );
01307         return 0;
01308     }
01309 }

01405 
01406 PRIVATE int setSpectrumPolyphase( int n, char **p )
01407 {
01408     BOOLEAN setit = atoi( p[0] );
01409 
01410     if ( uni->spec.polyphase != setit )
01411     {
01412         if ( setit )
01413         {
01414             uni->spec.polyphase = TRUE;
01415             uni->spec.mask = ( 8 * uni->spec.size ) - 1;
01416             {
01417                 RealFIR WOLAfir;
01418                 REAL MaxTap = 0;
01419                 int i;
01420 
01421                 WOLAfir =
01422                     newFIR_Lowpass_REAL( 1.0, ( REAL ) uni->spec.size,
01423                                          8 * uni->spec.size - 1 );
01424                 memset( uni->spec.window, 0,
01425                         8 * sizeof( REAL ) * uni->spec.size );
01426                 memcpy( uni->spec.window, FIRcoef( WOLAfir ),
01427                         sizeof( REAL ) * ( 8 * uni->spec.size - 1 ) );
01428                 for ( i = 0; i < 8 * uni->spec.size; i++ )
01429                     MaxTap = max( MaxTap, fabs( uni->spec.window[i] ) );
01430                 MaxTap = 1.0f / MaxTap;
01431                 for ( i = 0; i < 8 * uni->spec.size; i++ )
01432                     uni->spec.window[i] *= MaxTap;
01433                 delFIR_REAL( WOLAfir );
01434             }
01435         }
01436         else
01437         {
01438             uni->spec.polyphase = FALSE;
01439             uni->spec.mask = uni->spec.size - 1;
01440             memset( uni->spec.window, 0, sizeof( REAL ) * uni->spec.size );
01441             makewindow( uni->spec.wintype, uni->spec.size - 1,
01442                         uni->spec.window );
01443         }
01444         reinit_spectrum( &uni->spec );
01445     }
01446     return 0;
01447 }
01448 
01449 PRIVATE int setSpectrumWindow( int n, char **p )
01450 {
01451     Windowtype window = atoi( p[0] );
01452 
01453     if ( !uni->spec.polyphase )
01454         makewindow( window, uni->spec.size, uni->spec.window );
01455     uni->spec.wintype = window;
01456     return 0;
01457 }
01458 
01459 PRIVATE int setSpectrumType( int n, char **p )
01460 {
01461     uni->spec.type = SPEC_POST_FILT;
01462     uni->spec.scale = SPEC_PWR;
01463     uni->spec.rxk = RL;
01464     switch ( n )
01465     {
01466     case 3:
01467         uni->spec.rxk = atoi( p[2] );
01468     case 2:
01469         uni->spec.scale = atoi( p[1] );
01470     case 1:
01471         uni->spec.type = atoi( p[0] );
01472         break;
01473     case 0:
01474         break;
01475     default:
01476         return -1;
01477     }
01478     return uni->spec.type;
01479 }

01503     }

01507 
01508 PRIVATE int setNewBuflen( int n, char **p )
01509 {
01510     extern int reset_for_buflen( int );
01511     int rtn = -1;
01512 
01513     if ( n == 1 )
01514     {
01515         top->susp = TRUE;
01516         if ( reset_for_buflen( atoi( p[0] ) ) != -1 )
01517         {
01518             if ( uni->update.flag )
01519                 replay_updates(  );
01520             rtn = 0;
01521         }
01522         top->susp = FALSE;
01523     }
01524     return rtn;
01525 }

01529 // save current state while guarded by upd sem
01530 
01531 // reqMeter [label [TRX]]
01532 
01533 PRIVATE int reqMeter( int n, char **p )
01534 {
01535     if ( n > 1 )
01536     {
01537         int trx = atoi( p[1] );
01538 
01539         switch ( trx )
01540         {
01541         case TX:
01542             snap_meter_tx( &uni->meter, atoi( p[0] ) );
01543             break;
01544         case RX:
01545         default:
01546             snap_meter_rx( &uni->meter, atoi( p[0] ) );
01547         }
01548     }
01549     else
01550         snap_meter_rx( &uni->meter, n > 0 ? atoi( p[0] ) : 0 );
01551 
01552     sem_post( top->sync.mtr.sem );
01553     return 0;
01554 }
01555 
01556 // reqRXMeter [label]
01557 
01558 PRIVATE int reqRXMeter( int n, char **p )
01559 {
01560     snap_meter_rx( &uni->meter, n > 0 ? atoi( p[0] ) : 0 );
01561     sem_post( top->sync.mtr.sem );
01562     return 0;
01563 }
01564 
01565 // reqTXMeter [label]
01566 
01567 PRIVATE int reqTXMeter( int n, char **p )
01568 {
01569     snap_meter_tx( &uni->meter, n > 0 ? atoi( p[0] ) : 0 );
01570     sem_post( top->sync.mtr.sem );
01571     return 0;
01572 }
01573 
01574 // simile modo
01575 
01576 PRIVATE int reqSpectrum( int n, char **p )
01577 {
01578     snap_spectrum( &uni->spec, n > 0 ? atoi( p[0] ) : 0 );
01579     sem_post( top->sync.pws.sem );
01580     return 0;
01581 }
01582 
01583 PRIVATE int reqScope( int n, char **p )
01584 {
01585     snap_scope( &uni->spec, n > 0 ? atoi( p[0] ) : 0 );
01586     sem_post( top->sync.pws.sem );
01587     return 0;
01588 }

01781 //........................................................................
01782 
01783 int do_update( char *str, FILE * log )
01784 {
01785     BOOLEAN quiet = FALSE;
01786     SPLIT splt = &uni->update.splt;
01787 
01788     // append to replay file?
01789     if ( *str == '!' )
01790     {
01791         str++;                  // strip !
01792         if ( uni->update.flag )
01793             fputs( str, uni->update.fp );
01794     }
01795     // echo to logging output?
01796     if ( *str == '-' )
01797     {
01798         quiet = TRUE;
01799         str++;
01800     }
01801 
01802     split( splt, str );
01803 
01804     if ( NF( splt ) < 1 )
01805         return -1;
01806 
01807     else
01808     {
01809         Thunk thk = Thunk_lookup( update_cmds, F( splt, 0 ) );
01810 
01811         if ( !thk )
01812             return -1;
01813         else
01814         {
01815             int val;
01816 
01817             sem_wait( top->sync.upd.sem );
01818             val = ( *thk ) ( NF( splt ) - 1, Fptr( splt, 1 ) );
01819             sem_post( top->sync.upd.sem );
01820 
01821             if ( log && !quiet )
01822             {
01823                 int i;
01824                 char *s = since( &top->start_tv );
01825 
01826                 fprintf( log, "update[%s]: returned %d from", s, val );
01827                 for ( i = 0; i < NF( splt ); i++ )
01828                     fprintf( log, " %s", F( splt, i ) );
01829                 putc( '\n', log );
01830                 fflush( log );
01831             }
01832 
01833             return val;
01834         }
01835     }
01836 }
